content: What I loved most about this CoC is the fact that it's English is bad enough that without any indication of how the output should be determined it makes it just so annoyingly hard. Don't get me wrong, it's trivial to solve as soon as you find out what you should do based on the test cases and some lucky guesses.
This contribution hasnâ€™t received enough positive votes from the community. The "SHORTEST" option has therefore been deactivated.
3 validations. Not a word. Nice jobs guys.
